[Spatial statistics](https://gisgeography.com/spatial-analysis/) can relate environmental exposures to diseases illustrated on a map. This page compiles a list of resources available to conduct spatial statistics analysis.

# Geocoding Services: TEXAS A&M

Texas A&M offers a free geocoding service, called [TAMU GeoServices](http://geoservices.tamu.edu/). It requires creating a free account, but then you can geocode 2,500 addresses.
